{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/readme","text":"[img height=200 [https://nos.netease.com/ydschool-online/youdao_SAT_2.jpg]] 此学习包共有 4423 个来源于有道词典的单词。全面收录SAT考试词汇4423个，有道词典提供正版权威词库，参考College Board官方推荐权威辞典给出的单词释意及例句，帮助考生在语境中加深对单词的理解，更有针对性地备考。每个单词均列出短语和多项近义词，帮助考生掌握词汇实际运用方法，应对一词多义、一次多用的情况。适合准备SAT考试的用户以及英语学习爱好者。 可在 [[墨屉手册|https://tiddlymemo.org/manual/zh-Hans#鱼罐头子插件]] 查看安装使用教程。"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2]plugintiddlers[]tag[?]]":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2]plugintiddlers[]tag[?]]","type":"application/json","caption":"SAT词汇"},"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word":{"title":"$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word","tags":"$:/tags/QuestionTemplate","code-body":"yes","text":" {{!!word}}<$reveal default={{!!picture}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" >

"},"$:/SAT_2/pharmacy_1":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/pharmacy_1","tags":"?","word":"pharmacy","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'fɑːməsɪ","usphone":"'fɑrməsi","remMethod":" pharma (药) + cy (学科) → 药剂学","phrases":"college of pharmacy: 药学院；药剂学院
pharmacy equipment: 药房设备
","sentences":"an all-night pharmacy
^^通宵药店^^
","relWords":"n.
pharmacist: 药剂师
pharmacopoeia: 药典，处方书；一批备用药品
pharmaceutics: 制药学；配药学

","synos":"n.
药房；[药]配药学，药剂学；制药业；一批备用药品：dispensary, officina
"},"$:/SAT_2/toilsome_2":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/toilsome_2","tags":"?","word":"toilsome","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'tɒɪls(ə)m","usphone":"'tɔɪlsəm","relWords":"n.
toil: 辛苦；苦工；网；圈套
toiler: 劳动者；辛苦工作的人

vi.
toil: 辛苦工作；艰难地行进

vt.
toil: 费力地做；使…过度劳累

","synos":"adj.
辛苦的；劳苦的；费力的：hard, back-busting
"},"$:/SAT_2/efface_3":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/efface_3","tags":"?","word":"efface","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"ɪ'feɪs","usphone":"ɪ'fes","remMethod":" ef + face (脸； 表面) → 抹去表面 → 抹掉","sentences":"Nothing can efface the last picture I have of them from my mind.
^^没有什么能抹去他们在我脑海中留下的最后印象。^^
","relWords":"adj.
effaceable: 能擦掉的；可抹去的；会被忘却的

n.
effacement: 抹消；抹杀；忘却

","synos":"vt.
抹去，抹掉；使自己不受人注意：erase from, sponge
"},"$:/SAT_2/plastic_4":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/plastic_4","tags":"?","word":"plastic","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'plæstɪk","usphone":"'plæstɪk","phrases":"plastic deformation: [化]塑性变形，塑性应变
plastic film: 塑料薄膜；塑胶膜
plastic bag: 塑料袋；塑胶袋
plastic packaging: 塑料封装
plastic surgery: [医]整形外科
reinforced plastic: 增强塑料
plastic product: 塑料制品
plastic material: 塑性材料，塑料
plastic pipe: 塑料管，塑料管材
fiber reinforced plastic: 纤维增强塑料
plastic strain: 塑性应变
plastic part: 塑料件；塑料零件
plastic bottle: 塑料瓶
plastic welding: 塑态焊接；塑性焊接
plastic flow: 塑性流动；塑性流；范性流变；粘（滞）流（动）
plastic sheet: 塑料片材；薄片；塑料薄膜
plastic packing: 塑料包装；塑料填密
rigid plastic: 硬质塑料
foam plastic: 泡沫塑料；泡沫塑胶
plastic limit: 塑性极限；塑性限度
","sentences":"a plastic spoon
^^塑料汤匙^^
plastic bags
^^塑料袋^^
","relWords":"n.
plasticizer: 塑化剂；可塑剂
plasticity: 塑性，可塑性；适应性；柔软性
plasticiser: 增塑剂
plastically: 可塑性
plastique: 可塑炸弹

vi.
plasticize: 塑化
plasticise: （英）增塑（等于plasticize）

vt.
plasticize: 使塑化
plasticise: 使成可塑体

","synos":"adj.
[塑料][力]塑料的；（外科）造型的；可塑的：mouldable, malleable
n.
[塑料]塑料制品；整形；[力]可塑体：restricting, true-up
"},"$:/SAT_2/advocacy_5":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/advocacy_5","tags":"?","word":"advocacy","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'ædvəkəsɪ","usphone":"'ædvəkəsi","remMethod":" ad (为…) + voc (喊叫) + acy → 因为支持所以为其呐喊 → 拥护","relWords":"n.
advocate: 提倡者；支持者；律师
advocator: 提倡者，拥护者

vt.
advocate: 提倡，主张，拥护

","synos":"n.
主张；拥护；辩护：opinion, up with, affirmation
"},"$:/SAT_2/clutter_6":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/clutter_6","tags":"?","word":"clutter","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'klʌtə","usphone":"'klʌtɚ","remMethod":"人们为了抢购黄油 (butter)， 场面一片混乱 (clutter)","phrases":"sea clutter: 海面回波；海面干扰
clutter up: 使杂乱
","sentences":"Could you get rid of some of that clutter in your bedroom?
^^你能把你卧室那些杂物清理掉一些吗？^^
","synos":"n.
杂乱，混乱：chaos, disorder, confusion, involvement, mix
"},"$:/SAT_2/profession_7":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/profession_7","tags":"?","word":"profession","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"prə'feʃ(ə)n","usphone":"prə'fɛʃən","remMethod":"来自profess (v. 声称)","phrases":"profession of: 宣称(感情、信念等)；表白
legal profession: 法律界；法律专业
medical profession: 医疗职业
accounting profession: 会计职业
teaching profession: 教学工作；教学专业
by profession: 在职业上；就职业来说
accountancy profession: 会计专业；会计员
the oldest profession: [诙谐语]卖淫[亦作world's oldest profession]
","sentences":"people who work in the professions
^^从事专业性工作的人^^
nurses, social workers, and other people in the caring professions
^^护士、社工和其他从事护理行业的人^^
","relWords":"adj.
professional: 专业的；职业的；职业性的
professed: 声称的；公开承认的；伪称的

adv.
professionally: 专业地；内行地
professedly: 在表面上；公然地；专业地

n.
professional: 专业人员；职业运动员
professor: 教授；教师；公开表示信仰的人
professionalism: 专业主义；专家的地位；特性或方法
professionalization: 专业化；职业化
professorship: [劳经] 教授职位

v.
professed: 声称；断言；伪称（profess的过去分词）

vi.
profess: 声称；承认；当教授
professionalize: 专业化；职业化

vt.
profess: 自称；公开表示；宣称信奉；正式准予加入
professionalize: 使…专业化；使…专业化

","synos":"n.
职业，专业；声明，宣布，表白：employment, career, calling, pursuit, statement, occupation
"},"$:/SAT_2/parsimonious_8":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/parsimonious_8","tags":"?","word":"parsimonious","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":",pɑːsɪ'məʊnɪəs","usphone":",pɑrsə'monɪəs","relWords":"n.
parsimony: 吝啬；过度节俭

","synos":"adj.
吝啬的；过于节俭的；质量差的：tight, stingy
"},"$:/SAT_2/Phosphorus_9":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/Phosphorus_9","tags":"?","word":"Phosphorus","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'fɒsf(ə)rəs","usphone":"'fɑsfərəs","phrases":"total phosphorus: 总磷
yellow phosphorus: 黄磷
red phosphorus: 红磷；赤磷
phosphorus trichloride: 三氯化磷
phosphorus oxychloride: [化]磷酰氯；三氯氧化磷
white phosphorus: 白磷；黄磷
phosphorus pentoxide: 五氧化二磷
"},"$:/SAT_2/bravo_10":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/bravo_10","tags":"?","word":"bravo","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"brɑː'vəʊ; 'brɑːvəʊ","usphone":",brɑ'vo","remMethod":" “不赖哦” → 喝彩， 拍手叫好","sentences":"Bravo! Encore!
^^好极了！ 再来一个！^^
","synos":"n.
喝彩；亡命徒：plaudit, acclamation
vt.
喝彩：to applaud, cheer for
int.
好极了：marvy
"},"$:/SAT_2/alkali_11":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/alkali_11","tags":"?","word":"alkali","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'ælkəlaɪ","usphone":"'ælkə'lai","phrases":"alkali resistance: 抗碱性，耐碱性；耐碱坚牢度
alkali metal: [化]碱金属；[医]硷金属
alkali solution: 碱性液
alkali liquor: 碱液
caustic alkali: [化]苛性碱
","sentences":"The extremely salty, alkali lake holds little life, but its waters are a favorite spot for wading birds.
^^其味极咸，碱湖保存了湖中的小生命，但其水域仍为涉水鸟所喜欢的地方。^^
To get similar characteristics from composites, the carbon fibres are first chemically treated with an alkali which creates lots of tiny pits on their surface.
^^为了在复合碳材料上获取与电容器相似的性质，这种碳纤维首先经过碱化学处理以令其表面生成许多细微的凹点。^^
After seeing how this air makes the ugly sagebrush and the patches of alkali and brown earth a feast to the eye, one can understand how the light of heaven may make the ugliest faces beautiful.
^^这儿的空气能使丑陋的灌木和斑驳的盐碱地、褐色的泥土变成视觉盛宴。 只要见过这些，你就明白为什么说天堂的圣光能让最丑的脸变得美好。^^
","relWords":"adj.
alkalescent: 碱性的；弱碱性的
alkalic: 碱性的

n.
alkalinity: [化学] 碱度；[化学] 碱性

vi.
alkalify: 碱化
alkalinize: 碱化；成碱性
alkalize: 碱化；成碱性

vt.
alkalify: 使成碱性
alkalinize: 使碱化；使成碱性
alkalize: 使成碱性；使碱化

","synos":"n.
[化学]碱；可溶性无机盐：alcali
"},"$:/SAT_2/augment_12":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/augment_12","tags":"?","word":"augment","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"ɔːg'ment","usphone":"ɔɡ'mɛnt","remMethod":" aug (增加) + ment → 增加","sentences":"Any surplus was sold to augment their income.
^^所有多余的东西被售卖一空来增加他们的收入。^^
","relWords":"adj.
augmented: 增广的；增音的；扩张的
augmentative: 扩大的；增大意义的

n.
augmentation: 增加，增大；增加物
augmentative: 用来增强词义的语句

","synos":"vi.
增加；增大：improve, gain, accelerate, make, grow in
vt.
增加；增大：enhance, boost, jack, mount, hot
n.
增加；增大：enhancement, increase, gain, rise, accession
"},"$:/SAT_2/quarrelsome_13":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/quarrelsome_13","tags":"?","word":"quarrelsome","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'kwɒr(ə)ls(ə)m","usphone":"'kwɔrəlsəm","remMethod":" quarrel (争吵) + some (充满…的) → 她的生活中简直充满了争吵 → 喜欢吵架的","sentences":"He became quarrelsome after drinking too much.
^^他喝多了就爱找人吵架。^^
","relWords":"n.
quarrel: 吵架；反目；怨言；争吵的原因；方头凿
quarreler: 争吵者；喜欢埋怨的人
quarreller: 争吵的人；喜欢埋怨的人
quarrelsomeness: 喜吵架

vi.
quarrel: 吵架；争论；挑剔

","synos":"adj.
喜欢吵架的；好争论的：disputative, litigious
"},"$:/SAT_2/upheave_14":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/upheave_14","tags":"?","word":"upheave","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"ʌp'hiːv","usphone":"ʌp'hi:v","relWords":"n.
upheaval: 剧变；隆起；举起

","synos":"vt.
鼓起；举起；使隆起：summon up, elevate
"},"$:/SAT_2/unaccountable_15":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/unaccountable_15","tags":"?","word":"unaccountable","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"ʌnə'kaʊntəb(ə)l","usphone":"'ʌnə'kaʊntəbl","remMethod":" un (无) + accountable (a. 可解释的) → 无法解释的","sentences":"the unaccountable shyness she always felt in Louise’s presence
^^她在路易丝面前总是感到的莫名羞涩^^
For some unaccountable reason, he arrived a day early.
^^不知何故，他早到了一天。^^
","synos":"adj.
无责任的；莫名其妙的；不可理解的：indescribable, inscrutable
"},"$:/SAT_2/surmise_16":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/surmise_16","tags":"?","word":"surmise","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"sə'maɪz","usphone":"sɝ'maɪz","remMethod":" sur (下面) + mise (放) → 放下想法 → 推测","sentences":"There's so little to go on, we can only surmise what happened.
^^几乎没有什么可继续进行的，我们只能猜测发生过的事。^^
It is mere surmise that Bosch had Brant's poem in mind when doing this painting.
^^博斯画这幅画时头脑里想着勃朗特的诗，这只是猜测而已。^^
","relWords":"adj.
surmisable: 可以推测得出的，可揣度的

","synos":"vt.
猜测；推测：make a guess at, guess at sth
vi.
猜测；认为：consider, guess at sth
n.
推测；猜度：speculation, theory, guess, projection
"},"$:/SAT_2/celebrity_17":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/celebrity_17","tags":"?","word":"celebrity","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"sɪ'lebrɪtɪ","usphone":"sə'lɛbrəti","remMethod":" celebr (著名) + ity → 知名人士","sentences":"a sporting celebrity
^^体育明星^^
He’s a national celebrity.
^^他是全国有名的人物。^^
We invited a number of minor celebrities (= people who are not very famous ) .
^^我们邀请了一些小有名气的人物。^^
celebrity chef/gardener etc
^^名厨/名人园艺师等^^
","synos":"n.
名人；名声：personality, lion, fame
"},"$:/SAT_2/laborious_18":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/laborious_18","tags":"?","word":"laborious","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"lə'bɔːrɪəs","usphone":"lə'bɔrɪəs","remMethod":" labor (劳动) + ious (…的) → 劳动艰苦 → 艰苦的","sentences":"the laborious business of drying the crops
^^把收获的庄稼晒干这一艰苦的工作^^
","relWords":"adj.
labored: 吃力的；费劲的；不自然的
labouring: 劳动的；费劲的

adv.
laboriously: 辛苦地；费力地；不流畅地

n.
labouring: 劳动

v.
labored: 工作；劳动；分娩（labor的过去分词）
labouring: 劳动；努力；为…所苦恼；艰难地行进（labour的ing形式）

","synos":"adj.
勤劳的；艰苦的；费劲的：tough, trying, rough
"},"$:/SAT_2/petulant_19":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/petulant_19","tags":"?","word":"petulant","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'petjʊl(ə)nt","usphone":"'pɛtʃələnt","remMethod":" 他的宠物 (pet) 被私自借给 (lent) 别人， 让他很生气 (petulant)","sentences":"His critics say he's just being silly and petulant.
^^批评他的人说，他真是又愚蠢又任性。^^
","relWords":"adv.
pettishly: 任性地；易怒地；怒气冲冲地
petulantly: 任性地；脾气坏地

n.
petulance: 易怒；生气；性急；暴躁

","synos":"adj.
暴躁的；任性的；难以取悦的：fierce, cranky
"},"$:/SAT_2/volant_20":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/volant_20","tags":"?","word":"volant","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"'vəʊlənt","usphone":"'volənt","relWords":"adj.
volar: 手掌的，足底的；属于飞行的

","synos":"adj.
迅速的；[鸟][昆]会飞的；飞行的：rapid, fast, flying, forward, ready
"},"$:/SAT_2/degenerate_21":{"title":"$:/SAT_2/degenerate_21","tags":"?","word":"degenerate","created":"20220616115621358","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-SAT_2/Word}}","ukphone":"dɪ'dʒen(ə)rət","usphone":"dɪ'dʒɛnəret","remMethod":" de (变坏) + gener (产生) + ate → 产生了坏东西 → 衰退， 堕落","sentences":"Inactivity can make your joints stiff, and the bones may begin to degenerate.
^^不活动会使关节僵硬，骨骼因此可能会开始退化。^^
","relWords":"adj.
degenerative: 退化的；变质的；退步的

n.
degeneration: 退化；[医] 变性；堕落；恶化
degeneracy: 退化；[物] 简并；堕落；退步

","synos":"vt.
[数][生物]使退化；恶化：go ill, exasperate
vi.
[数][生物]退化；堕落：go to seed, retrogress
adj.
[数][生物]退化的；堕落的：fallen, degraded

^^十八世纪的英国有一个叫塞缪尔.约翰逊的词典编撰人（词典作者）。 他杜撰了“gray”这个单词，并提倡使用。^^
The lexicographer told the New York Times that "It's easy to stack the deck by finding a definition that does or does not highlight a nuance that you're interested in.
^^这位词典编纂者告诉《纽约时报》说，“事先找好对一方有利的定义以便突出或抹去词与词间的细微差别，这样造假其实很容易。”^^
"It has both currency and potential longevity," said Christine Lindberg, senior lexicographer for Oxford's US dictionary program, in a statement.
^^牛津美语辞典项目的高级词典编纂人克里斯汀•琳德伯格在一份声明中说：“这个词既符合当下的潮流，也有一定的潜在寿命。”^^
","relWords":"adj.
